## Introduction 

```{r load packages}
library(survival)
library(tidyverse)
```

### Inspect data
```{r dataset}
data(veteran)
str(veteran)
```

The Cox Proportional Hazards Model enables users to model event rates as a log-linear function of predictors/covariates. The model produces regression coefficients of each covariate.

```{r cox model}
cox_model <- coxph(Surv(time = time, event = status) ~ trt + celltype + age,
                   data = veteran)
cox_model
```
